title: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce: 1. [Please provide clear and complete steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Save the changes.
4. Go back to the report parameter settings.
5. Modify the default value.
6. Save the changes.
7. Close the report parameter settings.
8. Open the report parameter settings again.
9. Check if the default value is still retained or if it has been lost.
